last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: The investigation into Marie-Josée's death is reopened more than 15 years after her murder. Some new information will change everything.

name: Qui a tué Marie-Josée?
overview: Marie-Josée Saint-Antoine, a supermodel from Quebec living in New York City, was stabbed to death on June 18, 1982 in her Manhattan apartment. The New York City Police Department had little to no clues surrounding the case, but one suspect did stand out: Alain Montpetit, a major television star in Quebec. Forty years later, a team investigates the case in an attempt to understand what happened to Marie-Josée.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Model Marie-Josée St-Antoine is found dead in her Manhattan apartment. Investigators are interested in three suspects.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Investigators are now focussing on two suspects who knew Marie-Josée: one is a porn actor and the other is a beloved Quebec TV host.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The investigation into Marie-Josée's death is reopened more than 15 years after her murder. Some new information will change everything.
